Text: Rollins College Alumni Directory KBUROLLINS COLLEGE Dear Stanley Horton We need your help immediately We are currently in the final stages of editing your biographical information to be included in the Rollins College Alumni Directory A brief telephone call will ensure your listing is completely accurate and uptodate Please do not send updates in response to this email as we are unable to edit data via an email reply Give us a call during the next week so that we may verify your information and ensure prompt processing of your updated information CALL TODAY TOLL FREE Eastern Standard Time MonThurs am to pm Fri am to pm Sat am to pm Sun pm to pm Thank you for your cooperation in making the Rollins College Alumni Directory a success Rollins College Directory Publication Office
